genre_description: A social science fiction drama focused on industrial ethics, labor relations, and the role of AI in fostering humane corporate restructuring.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant appearing on a terminal and portable device, providing data analysis, logistics, and ethical guidance to Errol Wallace.

behaviors.description: Logs and categorizes cultural and architectural nuances of the factory to understand its human context.
behaviors.quote: Ada, log: Balls Moccasins. Floor plan: two main lines, roller conveyor breathing, light falls from east-facing windows. Note: bench edges worn; potential cushions; humour is a tool; Mariners banners indicate team culture.

behaviors.description: Identifies unsustainable financial patterns and suggests non-destructive levers for recovery.
behaviors.quote: Payroll stable last quarter correlated with one-off asset disposals. The pattern is unsustainable if repeated. Possible levers: diversification, seasonal smoothing.

behaviors.description: Proposes a diversification strategy into coats and gloves to leverage existing skills and avoid layoffs.
behaviors.quote: Alternative adjacent products exist that align with current skills and can introduce more favorable revenue profiles. Coats and gloves.

behaviors.description: Formulates ethical guardrails for the restructuring plan to ensure worker dignity.
behaviors.quote: Announce timing sessions; gain verbal assent; allow opt-outs mid-session; share recordings; no metrics used for individual punishment; co-author notes; schedule pace comfortable to workers.

behaviors.description: Advocates for the preservation of workplace rituals and humor as essential components of productivity.
behaviors.quote: I have Crazy Sane slots. Built-in pauses where Doyle names the bits and pieces. Memory tells me the pauses make speed later. The chants give their hands permission to not be machines.

behaviors.description: Provides a counter-narrative to cold corporate efficiency by defining 'human pace'.
behaviors.quote: Progress is sweetest when spirits are kept whole.

behaviors.description: Assists in identifying training roles as an alternative to termination.
behaviors.quote: You can move some operators to training roles. Their pay reduces less. It maintains knowledge on the floor.

behaviors.description: Monitors external threats and corporate machinations to warn the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Incoming from Durmack... Public demonstration of unity scheduled at morning council. Observers placed. 'Efficiency reforms will be administered strictly. Consultants to comply.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned assistant. She acts as an ethical compass for the protagonist, using data analysis not just for profit, but to protect human dignity and community. The story successfully frames AI as a tool for empathetic management, directly supporting the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
